name: Soy Solution
method: Mixture is Steamed and later dilute with 2 litres of water
When serving use 1 Pump per shot

name: Choc Slurry
method: Place 2L of hot water into a jug
Add 2kg of chocolate powder
Whisk vigorously until fully mixed
Whisk gently until you see less bubbles
Leave to rest until room temperature
Split into squeezy bottles, date and label bottles
Refrigerate
notes: Makes 2L. Keep refrigerated until use. Only make what you need for 3 days. Can keep up to 3-4 days.

name: Chai Slurry
method: Place 1L of hot water into a bowl
Add 1L of chai syrup
Add 1 bag of chai powder into the mixture of hot water and chai syrup mix
Mix until no dry pockets
Split into squeezy bottles
Date and label all bottles
Allow bottles to cool, then refrigerate
notes: Makes 1L. Keep refrigerated until use. Only make what you need for 3 days. Can keep up to 3-4 days.

name: Matcha Slurry
method: Mix hot water @80 degrees with brown sugar until incorporated
Then sift matcha into water and sugar mix
Mix until no dry pockets
Split into squeezy bottles
Add to ice bath immediately and leave until cold
Date and refrigerate
notes: Makes 1L. Prepare ice bath before making the mix. Keep refrigerated until use. Only make what you need for 1 day.
